text: Psycosissimo is a 1961 Italian crime-comedy film directed by Steno. It is a parody of Alfred Hitchcock's Psycho. == Cast == * Ugo Tognazzi: Ugo Bertolazzi * Raimondo Vianello: Raimondo Vallardi * Edy Vessel: Annalisa Michelotti * Monique Just: Marcella Bertolazzi * Franca Marzi: Clotilde Scarponi * Spiros Focás: Pietro, Annalisa's Driver and Lover * Francesco Mulé: Arturo Michelotti * Leonardo Severini: Inspector * Nerio Bernardi: Professor * Toni Ucci: Augusto * Ugo Pagliai: Student ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 films Category:Italian films Category:Italian parody films Category:Films directed by Stefano Vanzina Category:1960s parody films Category:Films scored by Carlo Rustichelli Category:1960s crime comedy films Category:1961 comedy films
title: Psycosissimo
